result.ga: Tá feabhas ag teacht ar mo chuid scileanna matamaitice
result.orig: Tá feabhas ag teacht ar mo chuid scileanna matamaitice
result.html: Tá feabhas ag teacht ar mo chuid scileanna matamaiticeMy mathematical skills are improving.
result.ponchtml: Tá feaḃas ag teaċt ar mo ċuid scileanna matamaiticeMy mathematical skills are improving.

result.eng: Do you have good interpersonal skills?
result.ga: An bhfuil scileanna idirphearsanta maithe agat
result.orig: An bhfuil scileanna idirphearsanta maithe agat
result.html: An bhfuil scileanna idirphearsanta maithe agatDo you have good interpersonal skills?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil scileanna idirṗearsanta maiṫe agatDo you have good interpersonal skills?

result.eng: The skills of musicians are gifts from God.
result.ga: Is buanna ó Dhia na scileanna atá ag lucht ceoil
result.orig: Is buanna ó Dhia na scileanna atá ag lucht ceoil
result.html: Is buanna ó Dhia na scileanna atá ag lucht ceoilThe skills of musicians are gifts from God.
result.ponchtml: Is buanna ó Ḋia na scileanna atá ag luċt ceoilThe skills of musicians are gifts from God.
